TopicTitle: When will the bug that wont let the game be saved, be fixed on xbox one?

Articles.Content:
I lost all my progress of getting a rover to eve due to this bug, and it's very frustrating that the game refuses to save so there's no point to playing ksp if all my progress is lost

Edited July 20, 2016 by Megadon

Ditto buddy. I want to play sooooo bad. I've lost several huge missions due to this bug TWICE so we are just completely out of luck until the patch. I just wish a dev would say something along the lines of how long it will take so that we can get a little peace of mind.

Edited July 21, 2016 by Homedawgian
I want to play ksp so badly but I can't because of this bug
Dude, really. I think I might start twitching soon if I don't get my fix. KSP withdrawals are serious.

Squaaaad! Where are yooouu?   Its like Your hiding from us!  Only comment ive seen From Squad was regarding Changable Button mappings    Then you all fleed!

 

I 3rd that! Feel With you guys soo much. Love the title, when it Works.

 

I havent tried starting a New game on console, from scratch yet, tho it might be a way too get sum playtime until its patched up.

Anyone knows if its possible too save games if started all over? Becouse i could be that is just stopps saving when the game gets too much info/load, or sumthing.

If so, on could restart a Career, then just give yourself a startupfund of 2Mill & 3000 XP for Research. Could put you back ingame With sum of what you lost atleast..... 

 

I reinstalled my PC Version last nite, With 10+ mods =D atleast its a full usable game, and not a "timed demo" as the console one seems too be for now.

I second that. I'm dying here.
